# llms.txt for Cristian Ariza's Blog

## Site Overview
This is the personal blog and portfolio website of Cristian Ariza, a Software Engineer with 4 years of hands-on experience in front-end and back-end development.

## Site Structure

### Main Pages
- `/` - Home page featuring experience timeline and projects
- `/about` - About page with personal information
- `/blog` - Blog listing page showing all available blog posts
- `/blog/[slug]` - Individual blog post pages

### Content Organization

#### Blog Posts
Blog posts are stored as Markdown files in the `/lib` directory. Each post includes:
- Title (from frontmatter)
- Publication date (from frontmatter)
- Excerpt (from frontmatter)
- Full content body (Markdown format)

#### Available Blog Posts
The following blog posts are available:
- how-i-got-my-first-developer-job
- my-current-role-at-club-lanus
- my-second-brain

### Content Format
- Blog posts use Markdown format with frontmatter
- Frontmatter includes: title, date, excerpt
- Posts are sorted by publication date (newest first)

### Navigation
- Top navigation bar with links to main sections
- Footer with additional links and information

### Technical Details
- Built with Next.js 16 (App Router)
- Uses React Server Components
- Static site generation for blog posts
- Markdown processing with gray-matter and react-markdown

## How to Access Content

### Blog Posts
To access a blog post, use the URL pattern:
`/blog/[slug]`

Where `[slug]` is the filename of the markdown file without the `.md` extension.

### Example URLs
- `/blog/how-i-got-my-first-developer-job`
- `/blog/my-current-role-at-club-lanus`
- `/blog/my-second-brain`

## Metadata
- Site URL: https://crisariza.com (or configured via NEXT_PUBLIC_SITE_URL)
- Language: English (en)
